abstract: The firm is bringing its favorite barber, Salvatore Anzalone, into its new headquarters while the building where he usually works is being remodeled.
snippet: The firm is bringing its favorite barber, Salvatore Anzalone, into its new headquarters while the building where he usually works is being remodeled.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs is taking haircuts. It’s not on the credit-default swaps of A.I.G. or any other investment, however. The Wall Street firm is bringing its favorite barber in-house.

headline.main: Talk About a Close Shave: Goldman Barber Moves In-House

byline.original: By Kevin Roose and Peter Lattman
